metadata.title: CVE-2022-31782 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
ftbench.c in FreeType Demo Programs through 2.12.1 has a heap-based bufferoverflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.10.1-2ubuntu0.2
libfreetype6 - 2.10.1-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.1-2ubuntu0.2').
